fullplot: Trio of fuzzy (and funny) aliens crash land in Valerie's pool-- putting a decided damper on her future wedding plans to cheating Dr. Ted Gallagher. Action interrupted by musical numbers--an MTV musical comedy.
plot: A spaceship with three furry aliens lands in a California girl's swimming pool, so she makes friends with them.
title: Earth Girls Are Easy

tomatoes.consensus: Earth Girls Are Easy is messy, silly, and not particularly bright -- qualities it comes by honestly and deliberately.
